description: One-year senior to Kazuki`s class, Ryou Masaoka participates in the L-Plan as a Fafner pilot. Prior to his involvement in the L-Plan, Ryou is diagnosed with a hereditary disease that gives him an extremely weak constitution. He also has an aunt, Saki Masaoka, who is an information officer in Mizoguchi`s squad.
name: Masaoka Ryou
